name: Find The Square
description:
A tiny puzzle game that I made in 24 hours using ✨Löve✨

Do you ever do that thing where you see criss-crossed lines and try to find a square? Like on a plaid shirt, or linoleum siding seen through a fence. That's what this game is!

Features:

  • Squares
  • Rectangles that are obviously not squares
  • Rectangles that look like squares but aren't (tricky)
